metadata.name: Forgotten Love #1/4
metadata.description:
I will keep in mind your visage - frozen for a moment in hopelessness,
Indifferent to you - because of your passing tenderness,
of your loneliness, of your blind single-mindedness,
of your confusion, of your silent youth.

All that you overtake, suspend, bring by,
Everything that has been and is, everything that you will persecute,
by night, by day, by winter, by summer, by spring
And in the autumn fields, everything remains with me.

(J.Brodsky, from "The Letter to A.D.")
